location.description:
We offer professional buyout services with free equipment pickup from any location in Florida—no need for you to leave your home. In Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Hialeah, and Hollywood, you can sell your tools and receive cash on the spot within 1–2 hours.

For clients in other areas of Florida, our appraisers arrive within:

South Florida (2–4 hours): West Palm Beach, Hollywood, Boca Raton, Coral Springs, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Gardens, Homestead, Aventura, and surrounding regions.

Central Florida (4–6 hours): Orlando, Tampa, St. Petersburg, Clearwater, Lakeland, Daytona Beach, Ocala, The Villages, and surrounding communities.

North Florida (6–8 hours): Jacksonville, Tallahassee, Gainesville, Pensacola, Panama City, Lake City, St. Augustine, and nearby areas.

listAsq.title: What types and brands of grinders and sanders do you buy in Florida?
listAsq.content: We accept all common types of electric and cordless models: angle grinders, die grinders, bench grinders, belt sanders, orbital sanders, detail sanders, and multi-function tools. Top brands we frequently purchase include DeWalt, Milwaukee, Makita, Bosch, RIDGID, Ryobi, Metabo HPT, Craftsman, Porter-Cable, and Hilti.

listAsq.title: How can I sell my used grinder or sander?
listAsq.content:
Just message us photos of your tool through any app — WhatsApp, iMessage, or Facebook Messenger. Within minutes, our team will review and send you a cash offer.
If it works for you, we’ll arrange free pickup and pay you the same day — no delays or hidden steps.

listAsq.title: Who buys used grinders and sanders for cash?
listAsq.content:
You could try platforms like eBay, OfferUp, or pawn shops, but these often involve fees, delays, or lowball offers.
We offer fast, fair cash deals without the waiting or back-and-forth.

listAsq.title: When will I be paid for my grinder or sander?
listAsq.content: Payment is issued right after a brief on-site check. Choose between cash, check, or direct bank transfer — all processed on the same day.

listAsq.title: Can I include cutting wheels, sanding pads, or accessories?
listAsq.content:
Yes — additional accessories are welcome and can increase your final quote.
We recommend brushing off dust and organizing your tools before pickup to get the best offer.
